attributes.action: Reduce the international student tuition fees in the UK by at least 20%
attributes.additional_details:
As non-citizens, international students do not benefit from welfare opportunities. Hence, they are left to fend for themselves during this pandemic. There has been little consideration given to the experiences of foreign students during this pandemic. We can not spend so much to receive so little

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/education-53552831
attributes.background: Reduce the international student tuition fees in the UK by at least 20% for this current academic year. International students are incurring high costs of tuition fees despite other costs of living during this pandemic.

rejection.details:
Fees for international students are set by individual universities, not the Government or House of Commons, but you may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
